ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Help with some ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: I go to all the weddings I can.  (Weddings and babies are my only female interests.)  At one, the cleric knew what to say and the couple exchanged rings and
ygData.messageBody:
I go to all the weddings I can. (Weddings and babies are my only female
interests.) At one, the cleric knew what to say and the couple exchanged
rings and everything. (He got a turtlebone ring. Think she planned to
throw him in the fountain.)

The prettiest one was held by the stream in Sanctus Seru. People brought
cake, we all drank. Then they retired to duel! The only bad spot was
during the mass buffings frenzy, one person turned into a doggie. The NPC
near there didn't like that.


*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 11/13/03 at pinkdusk7 wrote:

____>BTW this is jadedd_lover, my roommate uses that name lol not sure
____>why my yahoo picked that one. Anywhoo. I have 2 questions I hope you
____>will all be able to help me with. Firstly, I have to plan a wedding
____>for my 2 best friends. Of course there will be drinks and food. And
____>they have a ritual planned for the actual joining. I am thinking or
____>fireworks and such as well. Has anyone planned a wedding, would a
____>guide officiate..any other ideas for how we could make it special.
____>It's actually a double wedding. One is a 52 vah shir bard marying a
____>50 high elf enchantress and the other couple are a pr of 52 pallies
____>that share same deity, race, class ect!. and secondly, as a way to
____>have more fun and move away from xp grinding as well as to promote
____>new friendships within the guild i would like to host an rp event
____>but i dont really know where or how to start..if anyone has done one
____>before and could lend me some help or guidelines that would be
____>great. Thanks all =)
____>
